text: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all.
author: William Randolph Hearst

text: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count.
author: Neil Simon

text: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money.
author: Neil Cavuto

text: Fame, I have already. Now I need the money.
author: Wilhelm Steinitz

text: It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich.
author: Robin Leach
